Detailed Description

This class allows the user to create a Dom Document dynamically

Member Data Documentation

DOMDocument* DomBuilder::doc
private

The Xerces Dom document used for building the DOM

bool DomBuilder::has_root = false
private

If root has been created has_root will be true otherwise if root has not yet been created or has been deleted it will be false
